data.lyric:
[ti:One Thing Right (feat. Kane Brown)]
[ar:Marshmello/Kane Brown]
[al:One Thing Right (feat. Kane Brown)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]One Thing Right - Marshmello (棉花糖)/Kane Brown
[00:00.47]Lyrics by：Marshmello/Kane Brown/Jesse Frasure/Josh Hoge/Matt McGinn
[00:00.95]Composed by：Marshmello/Kane Brown/Jesse Frasure/Josh Hoge/Matt McGinn
[00:01.43]I've cheated and I've lied
[00:03.13]I've broke down and I've cried
[00:05.72]I've got nothing to hide no more
[00:11.25]I've loved and I've heard
[00:13.85]Broken people down with words
[00:16.45]More grace than I deserve for sure
[00:21.89]Known to be crazy known to be wild
[00:24.61]Mama had herself a little devilish child
[00:27.39]Ain't no stranger to the troubles at my door
[00:32.73]I been at the wrong place at the wrong time
[00:35.49]Chasin' all the wrong things most of my life
[00:38.21]Been every kinda lost that you can't find
[00:40.73]But I got one thing right
[00:43.65]Been the kinda guy girls mamas don't like
[00:46.25]Runnin' with the wrong crowd on the wrong nights
[00:49.13]'Cause I've been wrong about a million times
[00:51.63]But I got one thing right you
[00:56.31]Baby I got one thing right
[00:58.13]Mmm
[00:58.57]Baby I got one thing right
[01:00.34]Yeah I got you
[01:01.41]Baby I got one thing right
[01:03.07]I got one thing right
[01:05.94]You saw right through my pain
[01:08.42]Kept us patient while I changed
[01:10.88]Never even crossed your mind to walk away To walk away
[01:16.36]When I was gettin' crazy reckless and wild
[01:19.15]Actin' like my mama's little devilish child
[01:21.78]It took a heart like yours to find its place Find its place
[01:27.25]I been at the wrong place at the wrong time
[01:29.98]Chasin' all the wrong things most of my life
[01:32.68]Been every kinda lost that you can't find
[01:35.30]But I got one thing right
[01:38.19]Been the kinda guy girls mamas don't like
[01:40.87]Runnin' with the wrong crowd on the wrong nights
[01:43.59]'Cause I've been wrong about a million times
[01:46.14]But I got one thing right you
[01:50.86]Baby I got one thing right
[01:52.23]Mmm
[01:53.36]Baby I got one thing right
[01:54.76]Yeah I got you
[01:55.70]Baby I got one thing right
[01:57.58]I got one thing right
[02:02.82]I've been wrong about a million times
[02:07.63]But I got one thing right I got one thing right
[02:13.69]I been at the wrong place at the wrong time
[02:16.37]Chasin' all the wrong things most of my life
[02:19.17]Been every kinda lost that you can't find
[02:21.65]But I got one thing right I got one thing right
[02:24.80]Been the kinda guy girls mamas don't like
[02:27.13]Runnin' with the wrong crowd on the wrong nights
[02:29.91]'Cause I've been wrong about a million times
[02:32.48]But I got one thing right you
[02:37.09]Baby I got one thing right
[02:38.49]Mmm
[02:39.82]Baby I got one thing right
[02:41.11]Yeah I got you
[02:42.45]Baby I got one thing right
[02:43.88]I got one thing right
[02:46.26]I been at the wrong place at the wrong time
[02:49.02]Chasin' all the wrong things most of my life
[02:51.81]Been every kinda lost that you can't find
[02:54.19]But I got one thing right I got one thing right
data.trans:
[ti:One Thing Right (feat. Kane Brown)]
[ar:Marshmello/Kane Brown]
[al:One Thing Right (feat. Kane Brown)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.47]//
[00:00.95]//
[00:01.43]我说过谎 也欺骗过别人
[00:03.13]我潦倒过 也伤心失意过
[00:05.72]我不会再隐瞒过去的种种了
[00:11.25]我深爱过 也听别人说过
[00:13.85]恶语伤人
[00:16.45]毫无疑问 对我来说要仁慈得多
[00:21.89]以疯狂著称 以莽撞闻名
[00:24.61]妈妈生了个我这小恶魔般的孩子
[00:27.39]我早就对自己闯祸惹麻烦习以为常
[00:32.73]我总是在错误的时间出现在错误的地方
[00:35.49]大半生都在追寻遥不可及的梦想
[00:38.21]总是会迷失方向 陷入无助困境
[00:40.73]但至少我做对了一件事
[00:43.65]虽然我不是那种讨长辈和女孩们欢心的男人
[00:46.25]也会在不恰当的时间跟一群狐朋狗友鬼混
[00:49.13]反正我犯过不计其数的错
[00:51.63]但至少我做对了一件事 那就是你
[00:56.31]宝贝 至少我做对了一件事
[00:58.13]//
[00:58.57]宝贝 至少我做对了一件事
[01:00.34]没错 我选择了你
[01:01.41]宝贝 至少我做对了一件事
[01:03.07]我做对了一件事
[01:05.94]你能明白我心底的痛楚
[01:08.42]耐心等待我改头换面成熟蜕变的那一天
[01:10.88]你甚至从未想过要离开 离开我
[01:16.36]即便我失去理智 不计后果 鲁莽行事
[01:19.15]一举一动像极了我妈妈的小恶魔
[01:21.78]善良的你总能为我找到安心之所 安心之所
[01:27.25]我总是在错误的时间出现在错误的地方
[01:29.98]大半生都在追寻遥不可及的梦想
[01:32.68]总是会迷失方向 陷入无助困境
[01:35.30]但至少我做对了一件事
[01:38.19]虽然我不是那种讨长辈和女孩们欢心的男人
[01:40.87]也会在不恰当的时间跟一群狐朋狗友鬼混
[01:43.59]反正我犯过不计其数的错
[01:46.14]但至少我做对了一件事 那就是你
[01:50.86]宝贝 至少我做对了一件事
[01:52.23]//
